Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates by stating that Justice Ruth Bader Ginsburg is resigning from the post of associate justice of the Supreme Court, when in fact she has not made any announcement regarding retirement.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that Justice Ruth Bader Ginsburg has not announced her retirement.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as there is no evidence or announcement from Justice Ruth Bader Ginsburg herself regarding her resignation.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that Justice Ruth Bader Ginsburg's opposition to President-elect Donald Trump implies her resignation, which is a problematic assumption.
Exist alternative explanation: An alternative explanation is that Justice Ruth Bader Ginsburg's opposition to President-elect Donald Trump does not necessarily mean she will resign from her position.
